Question: Due to this, this person set records in player salary by signing annual contracts worth in excess of US $30 million per season.
Hints: At the 2003 All-Star Game, this person was offered a starting spot from Tracy McGrady and Allen Iverson, but refused both.
This person had a versatile offensive game.
That year, this person was the only Washington player to play in all 82 games, starting in 67 of them.
